column1: #Text=It looks like we can hit up most of them before we get to Ba Sing Se .
#Text=" Korra says : " We 're going to bring the Air Nation back from the brink of extinction after nearly two hundred years .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " And it 's all because of you , Korra .
